data.prayer: Please, convict the 330 believers in Trarza, Mauritania to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trarza, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Trarza, Mauritania.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 817 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Trarza that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 269,157 lost people in  Trarza, Mauritania have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Fulani, Fulakunda people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Fulani, Fulakunda people know you.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Trarza who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 269,900 citizens of the the state of Trarza.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trarza, Mauritania has a population of 269,900.

We estimate Trarza has 330 people who might know Jesus, 413 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 269,157 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 817 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Trarza, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.
